results.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
results.reason: This verse reassures that God is always present, eliminating the sense of loneliness.
results.reflection: Even in solitude, God's presence is constant and unwavering.

results.text: God sets the lonely in families, he leads out the prisoners with singing; but the rebellious live in a sun-scorched land.
results.reason: This verse highlights how God provides companionship and community for the lonely.
results.reflection: God’s love places us in a community, transforming loneliness into connection.

results.text: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes God's presence and support during times of loneliness.
results.reflection: In moments of isolation, God’s strength and support are ever-present.

results.text: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
results.reason: Jesus promises His perpetual presence, providing comfort against loneliness.
results.reflection: Christ’s promise ensures He is always with us, dispelling loneliness.

results.text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
results.reason: This verse offers comfort in the assurance of God's guidance and presence.
results.reflection: God’s comforting presence accompanies us through the darkest times.
